example.eg: This is a practical app; it helps me in several ways.
example.egtrans: 这是一款很实用的应用程序，给我提供了多方面的帮助。

example.eg: Andrew didn't really want to move back in with his parents after university, but he could see it was the practical thing to do.
example.egtrans: 安德鲁不想在毕业后搬回去跟父母住，但他也知道，这种做法比较切合实际。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 切合实际的, 切实可行的

example.eg: Eugene is very practical; he's good at putting up shelves and fixing things around the house.
example.egtrans: 尤金动手能力很强。他善于组装置物架，家里有坏了的东西他也都能修。

example.eg: Belinda is much too practical to throw away a good career because of a man.
example.egtrans: 贝琳达太理智现实，是不会为了一个男人而白白放弃一份好职业的。

example.eg: The students have a practical lesson this afternoon.
I did well on the written exam, but not on the practical.
The science course includes both theory lessons and practicals.
For all practical purposes my shares are now worthless.
He isn't a licensed mechanic but his work's good for practical purposes.
Students can greatly improve practical abilities when given on-site training.
Her theory's interesting, but I'm not sure it has any practical consequence.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 实际结果, 实际后果

example.eg: Many people play practical jokes on their unsuspecting friends on April first.
Some practical joker had filled my shoes with drawing pins.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 搞恶作剧的人, 恶作剧者

example.eg: I have some practical knowledge of physics but couldn't begin to explain quantum theory.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 实用知识, 实践性知识

dsense.name: practical nurse
dsense.guideword: US, Can (nursing: less trained) (美国、加拿大体系)

example.eg: There are two parts to the test: theoretical knowledge and practical skill.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 实用技能, 实践性技术, 实践性技术

example.eg: She passed her theory test but failed the practical test.
She decided not to go for purely practical reasons.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 纯实用的考量, 完全实用性的考虑
